document.full_text: notre dame suspended star wide receiver michael floyd indefinitely, a day after he was cited for drunken driving and authorities said his blood-alcohol level was more than twice the legal limit.
document.title: notre dame suspends wr floyd after dui charge
lines_and_colors: notre dame suspended star wide receiver michael floyd indefinitely, a day after he was cited for drunken driving and authorities said his blood-alcohol level was more than twice the legal limit.
